name: TerrorMan
description:
Ansi Horeman, called TerrorMan, is moslim guy, which is from christian family. He wants to kill many of christians, but many of special forces wanted him dead.

Aliens attacked our Earth, so will he kill christians or help all peoplle to fight aliens?

- retro game with retro graphics and gameplay

- over 24 hours of retro fast-paced gameplay

- 20 levels in each of 14 chapters

- you can drive jeeps, cars and rockets.

THIS GAME IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH WINDOWS 10 AND WON'T RUN UNDER WINDOWS 10.
